reviews.text: Fast, hot, fresh, and very good. Good portions that are reasonably priced. Haven't gotten a bad thing yet. I can see this being a regular place I get food from.

At times, I would prefer a sliders than a burger. Because I can get to try different flavor and don't fill up too fast 

Savvy Sliders have quite a few...
Savvy sliders is combined with Happy's Pizza's. I only tried the sliders on this visit. I ordered the Chicken sliders, fries and cheese curds everything was...
